department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: “The design of this course allows students to discuss with their supervisors some specific topics that interest them. The students have to read papers regarding the topic to build their knowledge and learn the research method and methodologies for general problem solving. Meanwhile, this course may include system implementation to enhance students‘ programming skills.“
goal.ch: 作業系統是軟體系統的核心，本課程之目標在於讓學生認識構成作業系統之基本元件與元件間的交互關係，並明白作業系統的運作原理。本課程除了介紹程序的管理外，將探討多程序同時執行時所可能帶來的問題與其解決方法；本課程也將介紹記憶體的管理與儲存系統的管理。

10 Virtual Memory

12 I/O Systems
13 File System Interface

15 File System Internals
16 Security
17 Protection
18 Virtual Machines
19 Networks and Distributed Systems
20 Case studies“
